Other Information.Additional Info: Ar atoms are trapped in spheroidal cavities with maximized van der Waals forces.
Linear O2 molecules cannot be fitted well into the spheroidal cavities.

Sieving Mechanism: Preferential adsorption of Ar over O2 through spheroidal shape-matched interactions.

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, GCMC simulation, SCXRD analysis
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Ar/O2 selectivity: 1.54 at 298 K and 1 bar, High-purity O2 productivity: 6.6 L kg−1 from 5/95 Ar/O2 mixture

Other Information.Additional Info: TYUT-20 demonstrated exceptional Ar uptake (14.5 cm3 g−1) and top-performing Ar/O2 selectivity under ambient conditions.
